title: Jacob MacWilliam Marine Corps service records

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

The Official Military Personnel File (OMPF) for Jacob MacWilliam (DOB: November 25, 1993), including Form DD-214, all Fitness Report and Counseling forms , Enlisted performance evaluation reports, administrative remarks, Cumulative Record of Training, history of assignments, dates of promotions, Marine Corps training history, all military decoration and full award citations, all military education/training courses.

Please also include:

- Service Number

- Dates of Service

- Branch of Service

- Final Duty Status

- Final Rank

- Salary

- Assignments and Geographical Locations

- Source of Commission

- Military Education Level

- Promotion Sequence Number

- Awards and decorations

- Photograph

- Transcript of Courts-Martial Trials

- Places of entrance and separation

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Glen Shortt
